chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall r : Relations LNT, codeArityLNTR (codeLNTRelation r) = S (arity LNT (inl r))

Premises:
codeLNTRelation = fun R : Empty_set => match R return nat with end : Empty_set -> nat
LNT = {| Relations := Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
codeArityLNTR = fun _ : nat => 0 : nat -> nat Arguments codeArityLNTR _%nat_scope
codeArityLNNRIsCorrect1 : forall r : Relations LNN, codeArityLNNR (codeLNNRelation r) = S (arity LNN (inl r))
atomic : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L), Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula L
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : Term L -> Term L -> Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula L | impH : Formula L -> Formula L -> Formula L | notH : Formula L -> Formula L | forallH : nat -> Formula L -> Formula L Arguments forallH _ _%nat_scope
codeArityLNNRIsCorrect2 : forall n : nat, codeArityLNNR n <> 0 -> exists r : Relations LNN, codeLNNRelation r = n
codeArityLNTRIsPR = const1_NIsPR 0 : isPR 1 codeArityLNTR
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2_not : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z4 q) ->...
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
Formula_depth_rec2rec_nice : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z4 q...
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z4 q)...
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q = f3 f z2 g z4 q) ->...
codeArityLNNR = fun r : nat => switchPR r 0 3 : nat -> (fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end) 0 Arguments codeArityLNNR _%nat_scope
codeLNTRelationInj : forall R S : Empty_set, codeLNTRelation R = codeLNTRelation S -> R = S
Nat.succ_inj_wd : forall n1 n2 : nat, S n1 = S n2 < -> n1 = n2
eq_add_S : forall n m : nat, S n = S m -> n = m
Nat.succ_inj : forall n1 n2 : nat, S n1 = S n2 -> n1 = n2
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
Relation_Operators.le_aa : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (x y : A), leA x y -> Relation_Operators.le_AsB A B leA leB (inl x) (inl y)
language_decideable = fun L : Language => ((forall x y : Functions L, {x = y} + {x <> y}) * (forall x y : Relations L, {x = y} + {x <> y}))%type : Language -> Set
Nat.eq_add_succ : forall n m : nat, (exists p : nat, n + m = S p) < -> (exists n' : nat, n = S n') \/ (exists m' : nat, m = S m')
apply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L), Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L
Nat.add_1_l : forall n : nat, 1 + n = S n
Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Arguments language (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
plus_Sn_m : forall n m : nat, S n + m = S (n + m)
Nat.add_succ_l : forall n m : nat, S n + m = S (n + m)
Nat.add_succ_r : forall n m : nat, n + S m = S (n + m)
Pnat.Pos2Nat.inj_succ : forall p : BinNums.positive, BinPos.Pos.to_nat (BinPos.Pos.succ p) = S (BinPos.Pos.to_nat p)
Nnat.N2Nat.inj_succ : forall a : BinNums.N, BinNat.N.to_nat (BinNat.N.succ a) = S (BinNat.N.to_nat a)
sum_rec : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Set), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> SProp), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_rect : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Type), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
sum_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A + B -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inl a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inr b)) -> forall s : A + B, P s
Nat.log2_up_eq_succ_is_pow2 : forall a : nat, Nat.log2_up (S a) = S (Nat.log2_up a) -> exists b : nat, a = 2 ^ b
Relation_Operators.le_AsB_sind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A + B -> A + B -> SProp), (forall x y : A, leA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : A) (y : B), P (inl x) (inr y)) -> (forall x y : B, leB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall s s0 : A + B, Relation_Operators.le_AsB A B leA leB s s0 -> P s s0
Relation_Operators.le_AsB_ind : forall (A B : Type) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (leB : B -> B -> Prop) (P : A + B -> A + B -> Prop), (forall x y : A, leA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : A) (y : B), P (inl x) (inr y)) -> (forall x y : B, leB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall s s0 : A + B, Relation_Operators.le_AsB A B leA leB s s0 -> P s s0

```coq
intros r.
rewrite codeLNTRelation. unfold codeLNTRelation.
rewrite codeLNTRelation. unfold codeLNTRelation.
Qed.```
